page.title: 04MUM'S DAY
page.content: 5.30 Wake and wash. 5.40 Make coffee and sit with a cup of coffee and a cigarette pick up knitting and do a few rows. 6.30 Get childrens pack lunch 7.00 Wake children 8.00 Make beds 8.30 Wash up breakfast things see children off to school put washing machine on.Hoover and wash any paint work,clean all areas in the house. 9.30 Do any ironing 10.00 If not shopping do needlework gardening and odd house repairs. 3.30 Prepare dinner. 4.30 Serve dinner. 5.00 Wash up. 6.00 Sit to watch news. 6.30 Tidy up,pick up knitting or needlework 8.30 Get children ready for bed 9.00 Children go to bed 12.00 I go.
